! colspan="2"! HTML tags:
|-
|colspan="2"| Supported tags:
* <code>code</code> - Monotyped text
* <code>tt</code> - Typewriter text (similar to code)
* <code>pre</code> - Preformatted text (represented as a block of text)
* <code>nowiki</code> - No wiki formatting between these tags (note: nowiki tags cannot be nested)

NOTE: Be careful when using HTML tags! Make sure you always add the closing tag. If the tags are malformed, you will get an error when you save the page saying something like this:
<pre>
XML Parsing Error: mismatched tag. Expected: /pre.
Location: http://localhost:3003/wiki/show/Wiki%20Formatting%20Demo
Line Number 233, Column 3:</td></tr>
</pre>
Should that happen, use the browser's '''Back''' button to get back to the edit form and verify that all HTML tags have open '''and''' closing tag. If you can't  solve the problem, remove all HTML tags and try again.
